name: release0
description: By the end of this milestone ensure that you  - [ ] write tests for any program you are ever going to build  - [ ] are able to create and use object prototypes in js  - [ ] have understood how everything is an object in js & how powerful it is  - [ ] have practiced refactoring methods for your code  - [ ] able to appreciate the importance of thinking of time and planning of the project  - [ ] learn and practice a few software design patterns like Don't-Repeat-Yourself etc
